title: Louis Vuitton Totally PM Tote
description: Louis Vuitton Totally PM in Damier Azur coated canvas. Featuring cowhide leather trims and shoulder strap, gold-tone hardware, and bucket pocket on either side. The top with zipper closure opens to a beige colour textile interior with 2 patch pockets. Approximate dimensions: 28cm(Base-L) x 24cm(H) x 14cm(D), with a 22cm shoulder drop. Accompanied by a Louis Vuitton dustbag. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
